name: Super starlight toaster:DEMO
description:
Super starlight toaster is...
Simple hardcore platformer about brave little toaster, that want to toast some bread.
But the bread is not very happy with it. They build dangerous "levels" and robots that will stop the toaster!

Demo have:
• 1 of 4 chapters.
• 15 levels and 1 boss.
• Original soundtrack.
• Gamepad support.
• Cute toaster.


Final realise plans:
• Make all 4 chapters.
• Multiplayer chapters.
• Map editor.

Dev words:
I spend a lot of time in this game, and after around a year, i make it...I really enjoyed while making this game, and i hope you like to play it!
